author: bsunanda
body:
#### PR description:

Complete masking for all types of partial wafers. Now one can get the partial wafer type and the rotation position from the layer number, u, v values

#### PR validation:

Use runTheMatrix.py

#### if this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR:

Nothing special
title: Phase2-hgx241 Complete masking for all types of partial wafers
